messages.title: This election is your chance to change things.
messages.content: Over the next two years the UK will negotiate its exit from the European Union. The outcome of those negotiations will affect our country forever. It is vital that during this time Vauxhall has a voice that represents our values.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Hold the Government to account on Brexit
keyPolicies.policyDescription: I will oppose the Government's hard Brexit plans and make sure that our rights are protected, and the rights of our friends and neighbours are too.
I will campaign for better, more affordable housing and against Conservative cuts to our schools and NHS.

mentions.tacticalSituation: In this election UKIP are not standing a candidate, supporting her candidacy instead.

issues.brexitEurope: I will oppose the Government's hard Brexit plans and make sure that our rights are protected, and the rights of our friends and neighbours are too.
issues.economy: Together we can change the future of our country.
issues.education: I will campaign for better, more affordable housing and against Conservative cuts to our schools and NHS.
issues.government: I will ferociously hold the Government to account on Brexit.
issues.health: I will campaign for better, more affordable housing and against Conservative cuts to our schools and NHS.

examples: This election is your chance to change things.
Together we can change the future of our country.
Your vote will send a powerful message that millions of people say 'no' to this damaging, divisive Brexit.
Above all, your vote can show that there is a growing opposition that will fight for change.
I will campaign for better, more affordable housing and against Conservative cuts to our schools and NHS.
It is vital that during this time Vauxhall has a voice that represents our values.
Over the next two years the UK will negotiate its exit from the European Union. The outcome of those negotiations will affect our country forever.
I will ferociously hold the Government to account on Brexit.
Your vote will send a powerful message that millions of people say 'no' to this damaging, divisive Brexit.
Your vote will send a powerful message that millions of people say 'no' to this damaging, divisive Brexit.
I was deeply concerned to see the Labour candidate Kate Hoey campaign alongside Nigel Farage and promote UKIP against the rights of EU citizens living in our community.

nonPolicyAttributes.localness: It is vital that during this time Vauxhall has a voice that represents our values.

examples: It is vital that during this time Vauxhall has a voice that represents our values.
